content: अभिमंत्र् {c10c} <ab>A.</ab> (<ab>P.</ab> also) {@--1@} To consecrate or accompany with sacred hymns; पशुरसौ योऽभिमंत्र्य क्रतौ हतः <ls>Ak.</ls>; वामदेवाभिमंत्रितोऽश्वः <ls>U. 2</ls>; <ls>Y. 3. 326</ls>; <ls n="Y.">2. 102</ls>; <ls n="Y.">3. 278.</ls> {@--2@} To consecrate with magical formulas, charm, enchant, invoke or invite by means of charms; तदभिमंत्रितेन चरणेन <ls>Dk. 138</ls>; पानीयैरभिमंत्रितैः <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--3@} To speak to, address, invite.
